place.name: TREGARE
place.gazetteerText: TREGARE, a parish in the district and county of Monmouth; 1½ mile NNW of Raglan-Footpath r. station, and 6¼ W by S of Monmouth. Post town, Raglan, under Newport, Monmouth. Acres, 2,387. Real property, £2,825. Pop., 319. Houses, 69. The property is much subdivided. The living is a p. curacy, annexed to Dingestow. The church is old but good. Charities, £24. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
